story-moment.MEETING THOR: When Dr. Selvig and his students Jane Foster and Darcy Lewis came upon an astronomical anomaly on Earth, they accidentally hit a man with their van, who claimed to be the Asgardian Thor Odinson, a legend from Norse mythology.
story-moment.STABILIZING THE TESSERACT: S.H.I.E.L.D. sought Selvig out to stabilize the Tesseract, an unknown source of immense energy, but housing an Infinity Stone known as the Space Stone.
story-moment.RECOVERING FROM NEW YORK: The events of the Battle of New York and Loki's mind control took a toll on Selvig who had difficulty recovering his mental faculties causing him running around nude claiming he was saving people and spouting theories about the Convergence.
story-moment.A CONVERGENCE IN GREENWICH: Selvig discerned through calculations that Greenwich, England was the spot in the Convergence where the Aether could be used, and thus where Malekith would invade.
story-moment.GOING UPSTATE: Due to his expertise in science and Asgard, Selvig was recruited to work for the Avengers at their new facility in upstate New York.

powers+abilities.ASTROPHYSICS: While he has no super human abilities, Doctor Erik Selvig is a renowned astrophysicist who studies cosmic energy.
powers+abilities.WORMHOLE EXPERT: After working alongside Jane Foster and discovering the existence of wormholes, he becomes an expert on the subject.
powers+abilities.P.E.G.A.S.U.S. PROJECT: For his scientific prowess, S.H.I.E.L.D. invites him to consult on a secret project called P.E.G.A.S.U.S., studying the powerful object known as the Tesseract.
powers+abilities.EXPERT ON CONVERGENCE: Once his mind was recalibrated and recovered somewhat from Loki’s mind control, he seemed to understand the nature of the Convergence, a singular event where the Nine Realms in the universe aligned.
